Twitch streamer Invader V is coming under fire for shaming unsubscribed viewers for not supporting her channel monetarily, in spite of current global events that could have caused many to lose their job entirely.  Like many live streaming platforms, Twitch allows viewers a myriad of ways to support their favorite content creators by donating, subscribing, or even gifting subscriptions to others.
